Title: The legacy of the experimental hadron physics programme at COSY
Abstract: © 2017, The Author(s).The experimental hadronic physics programme at the COoler SYnchrotron of the Forschungszentrum Jülich terminated at the end of 2014. After describing the accelerator and the associated facilities, a review is presented of the major achievements in the field realized over the twenty years of intense research activity.
